Article Title: Elias Pettersson‚Äôs wife, Katelyn Byrd steals the spotlight as her Swedish candy brand ‚ÄúSwete‚Äù sells out in minutes
Article Text:
Elias Pettersson‚Äôs wife, Katelyn Byrd, steals the spotlight as her Swedish candy brand ‚ÄúSwete‚Äù sells out in minutes (Image Via Twitter)

How Elias Pettersson‚Äôs Wife, Katelyn Byrd, turned a Vancouver Canucks game into a sweet sensation with ‚ÄúSwete‚Äù

How Elias Pettersson‚Äôs Wife, Katelyn Byrd, turned a Vancouver Canucks game into a sweet sensation with ‚ÄúSwete‚Äù (Image Via IG/@katelynbyrd

This month, Katelyn Byrd, wife of Elias Pettersson, revealed in a YouTube vlog the teaser of her brand, Swete, which is predominantly chocolate and sweets inspired by the Swedish tradition, and she shared some behind-the-scenes clips of the brand's first photoshoot at Rogers Arena, the home ground of the Vancouver Canucks. The video captured Pettersson driving Katelyn to the venue while she was getting ready for the shoot. Katelyn narrated that the unearthing of Sweden‚Äôs Saturday candy custom ‚ÄúL√∂rdagsgodis‚Äù was the rendering of the brand Swete, which was inspired by her modeling growing up and her trips to Scandinavia.On Tuesday, Swete made its premiere during the game between the Canucks and Winnipeg Jets, wherein the latter team won by 5-3. The audience present in the arena was the first to get access to the candies, and they conveyed their enthusiasm via social media accounts. The game was set to start at 7 p.m. ET, and it was broadcast live on ESPN+, hence allowing the viewers at home to see the efforts of Pettersson on the ice as well as the launch of Katelyn‚Äôs brand. A lot of fans held up with pride their Swete packets, marking the launch of the drink with their favorite team.Katelyn Byrd, through her Instagram account, shared the exciting moments, showing the other consumers of the new brand. ‚ÄúSpotted üò≠üç¨@swetetreat,‚Äù she exclaimed. Then, she posted, ‚ÄúI'm crying you girls are so cute ü•∫‚Äù ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre almost sold out in the first period ü´∂ü•∫,‚Äù in a way, narrating the extraordinary reaction. The introduction of the product not only spread joy but also tied up a bond between Pettersson and the audience, revealing a part of his life that was off-hockey.Elias Pettersson was on the ice and assisted two times, but the offense of the Jets was overwhelming. Pettersson's performance and Swete's sell-out debut still made the night unforgettable for the spectators.Katelyn Byrd's Swete was gone in a flash, indicating the fans who adore chocolate like NHL players, while Pettersson's showing brought to mind his importance for Vancouver Hockey.More coverage on NHL
Article Summary: Elias pettersson‚Äôs wife, katelyn byrd, steals the spotlight as her swedish candy brand ‚Äúswete‚Äù sells out in minutes. The audience present in the arena was the first to get access to the candies, and they conveyed their enthusiasm via social media accounts.

Article Title: Selena Gomez reportedly takes on a new role in Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce‚Äôs life as friendship with Blake Lively worsens
Article Text:
Taylor Swift has been pulled into drama again by Blake Lively.(Image via Getty Images)

Selena Gomez helps Taylor Swift as her friendship with Blake Lively reportedly worsens



More coverage on the NFL -

Taylor Swift has been pretty close to popular pop star and entrepreneur, Selena Gomez, after she distanced herself from her former best friend, Blake Lively, last year.With Taylor Swift focusing on her upcoming wedding with Travis Kelce, it seems she has gotten closer to Selena Gomez, while Blake Lively has pulled her into drama again.As per Radar Online and Page Six, sources have revealed that Taylor Swift is seeking advice from Selena Gomez regarding her wedding. This includes advice on the guest list, decor, flowers and the food that will be served at the wedding.With Selena Gomez recently celebrating her lavish wedding with Benny Blanco, Taylor Swift seems to have found the right person to take inspiration from.While Taylor Swift seems to be fully focused on her upcoming wedding celebrations, her friendship with Blake Lively might have worsened as she has been pulled into the legal mess with Justin Baldoni again.As per reports, Blake Lively‚Äôs legal team had submitted a list of names a few months ago. This list contains names of high profile celebrities "individuals who are likely to have discoverable information" relating to her allegations of misconduct against Justin Baldoni.As per E! News, the list includes Taylor Swift, supermodel Gigi Hadid, popular actor Hugh Jackman, Ryan Reynolds, Scooter Braun and Emily Blunt.The document has alleged that Taylor Swift will have knowledge of ‚Äúthe parties‚Äô alleged conduct; complaints or discussions about the work environment or conduct on the set of the Film; the production, editing, cut, and creative process associated with the Film; publicity surrounding the Film; the retaliation campaign alleged by Ms. Lively and resulting damages suffered.‚ÄùThis news comes at a time when Taylor Swift has completely distanced herself from Blake Lively after Justin Baldoni named the pop star in the lawsuit filed against the popular actress.As Taylor Swift plans her wedding with Travis Kelce, there are also strong speculations that she might be excluding Blake Lively and her husband, Ryan Reynolds, from the guest list due to the ongoing drama.However, both Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have remained tight lipped about their wedding plans.
Article Summary: Taylor swift is seeking advice from selena gomez regarding her wedding. This includes advice on the guest list, decor, flowers and the food that will be served at the wedding. It comes at a time when taylor swift has completely distanced herself from blake lively after justin baldoni named her in the lawsuit.

Article Title: Adin Ross says he won‚Äôt do ‚Äúbig streams‚Äù on Kick, confirms return to Twitch with 6ix9ine and Carti collab
Article Text:
Adin Ross has confirmed his Twitch return for 6ix9ine and Carti collabs, and says that Kick isn‚Äôt growing (Image via: @adinross/Instagram)

Adin Ross says Kick is ‚Äúlacking,‚Äù plans major Twitch streams with 6ix9ine and Playboi Carti

‚ÄúHey guys I‚Äôll be streaming on Twitch for the 6ix9ine stream, and the Carti stream,‚Äù

‚ÄúNo point of doing big streams on Kick. At least on Twitch I will gain followers and mainstream growth.‚Äù

‚Äúgame nights, regular desktops, gambling, and streams that make sense.‚Äù

‚Äúactually do it,‚Äù

‚ÄúI am.‚Äù

‚ÄúI got told yesterday, unless I‚Äôm gambling on Stake, they are not upping my KCIP.‚Äù

‚ÄúIf you're not on Stake.com, they lower your s**t. I'm sorry.‚Äù





Adin Ross has sparked massive online chatter after announcing a surprising return to Twitch, the very platform he left for Kick. On November 11, 2025, the Florida-born streamer revealed that he plans to host major livestreams with rappers 6ix9ine and Playboi Carti on Twitch, not Kick, citing platform visibility as the main reason.Ross, who once championed Kick and helped it gain traction, didn‚Äôt hold back in explaining why he‚Äôs shifting focus. In a series of posts from his alternate X account, @AR15thed3mon, he said there was ‚Äúno point‚Äù in doing ‚Äúbig streams‚Äù on Kick anymore, claiming Twitch still offers better mainstream growth. His move immediately drew reactions across social media, from excitement to speculation about trouble between him and Kick‚Äôs management.On November 11, 2025, Adin Ross announced his plans to go live on Twitch for two high-profile collaborations, one with 6ix9ine and another with Playboi Carti.Ross wrote on X.The 25-year-old emphasized that the move isn‚Äôt permanent, but rather a strategic one aimed at increasing discoverability. He promised fans he wouldn‚Äôt run ads during the streams, clarifying that Kick would still host hisDespite co-owning Kick, Ross admitted that its reach and engagement weren‚Äôt where he wanted them to be.His statements immediately went viral, with a lot of fans commenting on the post. One user, @TheGreeny777, challenged him toto which Ross quickly replied,The exchange added fuel to the buzz, positioning Ross‚Äôs Twitch return as a significant moment in the ongoing streaming platform rivalry.Shortly after his Twitch announcement, Adin Ross claimed that Kick had reduced his payout due to his separation from Stake, the gambling platform behind Kick‚Äôs funding. During a recent Just Chatting session, Ross told his audience,Ross said his current affiliation with Rainbet led to a payout cut, adding,The streamer appeared frustrated, hinting that Kick‚Äôs creator incentives are heavily tied to Stake‚Äôs ecosystem, something he called ‚Äúcrazy.‚Äù
Article Summary: Adin ross has confirmed his twitch return for 6ix9ine and carti collabs, and says that kick isn‚Äôt growing. Ross has sparked massive online chatter after announcing a surprising return to twitch, the very platform he left for kick. His move immediately drew reactions across social media, from excitement to speculation about trouble between him and kick's management.

Article Title: Sneako fires back at Adin Ross and Cuffem, calls out hypocrisy in streamer culture
Article Text:
X/@sneako

‚Äúsneak-dissing‚Äù

‚Äúcut ties‚Äù

‚Äúgambling and lean,‚Äù

‚Äúsoft‚Äù

Sneako defends his words, says streamers cross bigger lines without backlash

‚ÄúYou can talk about your friend‚Äôs aunt, get them to twerk on stream, talk about dead relatives, say you‚Äôre smoking on ashes, people‚Äôs dad‚Äôs getting r-ped in jail, talk about people‚Äôs brothers. But if I say gambling and lean, I‚Äôm soft?‚Äù

‚Äúacceptable‚Äù





In a viral post that‚Äôs quickly become the center of streaming drama, Sneako has fired back at Adin Ross and Cuffem, addressing freshallegations and defending his recent remarks. The controversy erupted after fans accused Sneako of taking indirect shots at both creators, prompting him to respond with a fiery rant highlighting what he believes are double standards within the streaming community. His post, shared on X, drew millions of impressions overnight, sparking heated debates over where the line between criticism and hypocrisy really lies.Sneako‚Äôs comments directly reference a long-standing rift with Adin Ross, who previously claimed to havewith the creator due to differences involving a former manager. In his latest statement, Sneako dismisses the idea that his words were meant as personal attacks, instead framing them as a callout of the culture‚Äôs inconsistent standards. He argued that other streamers often get away with offensive or extreme jokes, yet when he mentions lighter topics likehe‚Äôs labeledor disloyal.In the now-viral post, Sneako wrote,The remark, though pointed, reflects his frustration with what he perceives as a hypocritical system of judgment in streamer circles, one where some creators face harsh criticism while others escape scrutiny for worse behavior.While Adin Ross and Cuffem have yet to publicly respond, the community‚Äôs reaction has been divided. Some fans sided with Sneako, praising his willingness to call out double standards, while others accused him of reigniting unnecessary drama. The post has since fueled larger conversations about accountability in online entertainment, where controversy often drives views more than content boundaries.Sneako‚Äôs response marks another chapter in his turbulent relationship with the streaming world, one defined by clashes over authenticity, loyalty, and what‚Äôs consideredcontent. Whether his remarks were a justified critique or another spark in an ongoing feud, they‚Äôve reignited debate about hypocrisy in streamer culture, proving once again that in the world of live content, the line between real and performative outrage remains dangerously thin.Also Read: Destiny makes explosive allegation against HasanAbi involving a girl during Berlin trip
Article Summary: Sneako responds to fans who accused him of taking indirect shots at adin ross and cuffem. He says his comments were meant as a callout of the culture's inconsistent standards. The post has reignited debate about hypocrisy in streamer culture.

Article Title: Bill Gates: We make it clear that it is not our role to say, OK, the US government wants to save money, so we will ...
Article Text:
Bill Gates: Cannot replace government funding

Bill Gates No Longer among Top 10 Billionaires: The Real Reason





Gates Foundation recently announced $2.5 billion commitment over the next five years to advance women's health initiatives worldwide. The funding aims to fuel dozens of projects, from life-saving maternal medicines to vaccines targeting infections that hit women hardest. The pledge marks a roughly 33% jump in the foundation's investments in women's and maternal health compared to the prior half-decade. It is the largest funding commitment the Gates Foundation has made in women‚Äôs health. The pledge also is a sign of the areas where Bill Gates wants to focus on as he seeks to donate the vast majority of his $114 billion fortune before winding down the foundation over the next 20 years. Gates spoke about the pledge during an event with STAT this week.The vast majority of the funds ‚Äî as much as 70% ‚Äî will go to research and development. About a tenth will go to market introduction of new technologies or generating better data around them. Only about 4% will go to manufacturing, and 3% to advocacy. "It's curious why some of these areas are so under-invested, because the rich world health burden on preeclampsia specifically is still, you know, very high," Bill Gates remarked during a briefing, highlighting one of the hypertensive disorders that claim thousands of women's lives annually, even in wealthy nations.The portfolio brims with high-tech promise. Backed by the foundation's dollars will be self-injectable contraceptives for easier access, long-lasting contraceptive patches, lightning-fast diagnostics for STIs, and deep dives into the human microbiome's role in everything from pregnancy complications to broader women's health challenges, including disease transmission.Yet Bill Gates was clear-eyed about the foundation's boundaries. "One thing we make very clear is we're not able to replace what the U.S. government has canceled," he said, nodding to recent federal budget trims in global health programs. Gates told STAT, "It's just not our role to say, OK, the U.S. government wants to save money and so we'll help them do that."In fields like malaria, tuberculosis, and non-hormonal birth control, the Gates Foundation already reigns as the world's top funder, Gates noted. Its R&D bets will yield lasting innovations that outlive the organization's support. But for on-the-ground health delivery, the clock is ticking: The foundation's aid is designed to be temporary, hinging on sustainable handoffs to other players.Even with Gates' immense wealth as a backstop, he stressed the need for collective action. A core aim, he and his team emphasised, is to ignite urgency among governments, pharmaceutical giants, and researchers to prioritise women's health disparities‚Äîlong overlooked despite their outsized toll."We'd love to have other people work on this stuff," Bill Gates said. "It's crazy that this stuff isn't better funded. Drawing governments and other philanthropists in‚Äîwe've had some success at that, and I'm putting more time into talking with other philanthropists about how impactful this work is. So I think we'll have a lot of additional partnerships, certainly at the end of the 20 years", he added."Then we're gone," he added pointedly, "and so other people will have to step up in these areas."As the foundation accelerates its sunset strategy, this women's health push underscores a pivotal shift: from lone-wolf giving to catalysing a broader ecosystem. With maternal deaths still claiming a life every two minutes globally, advocates hailed the commitment as a vital spark‚Äîone that could, if multiplied, finally bend the arc toward equity.Recently, the Gates Foundation announced a $2.5 billion commitment through 2030 to advance women‚Äôs health, marking its largest-ever investment in the field. The funding will support a wide range of initiatives ‚Äî from developing new medicines to prevent maternal deaths to creating vaccines that target infections disproportionately affecting women.The new pledge represents a roughly one-third increase in the foundation‚Äôs funding for women‚Äôs and maternal health compared to the past five years. It is also a small illustration of the kinds of commitments that Bill Gates is making as he seeks to donate the vast majority of his $114 billion fortune before winding down the foundatio
Article Summary: Gates foundation recently announced $2.5 billion commitment over the next five years to advance women's health initiatives worldwide. The pledge marks a roughly 33% jump in the foundation's investments in women's and maternal health compared to the prior half-decade.

Article Title: Cybertruck Program head Siddhant Awasthi departs Tesla after 8 years: How he transformed Tesla‚Äôs EV programmes, his journey and legacy
Article Text:
Source: X

Siddhant Awasthi‚Äôs journey through Tesla: From Model 3 to Cybertruck





Siddhant Awasthi‚Äôs impact on Tesla and the Cybertruck









Siddhant Awasthi, Tesla‚Äôs head of the Cybertruck programme, has announced his departure after more than eight years with the company. Rising from an intern to a senior leadership role, Awasthi played a key part in shaping several of Tesla‚Äôs landmark projects, including the Model 3, the Shanghai Gigafactory, and the groundbreaking Cybertruck. In a LinkedIn post, he reflected on his journey, highlighting the challenges and achievements that defined his career. Known for his technical expertise and leadership skills, Awasthi‚Äôs exit marks the end of a significant chapter for Tesla, leaving a lasting legacy on the company‚Äôs electric vehicle programmes and demonstrating the impact of innovation, dedication, and collaborative effort in advancing Tesla‚Äôs mission and shaping the future of sustainable automotive technology worldwide.Awasthi‚Äôs career at Tesla began as an intern immediately following his graduation in 2018. He quickly impressed the leadership with his technical expertise and drive, earning a promotion to engineering manager within two years. This rapid rise continued when he became senior technical programme manager, overseeing the development of the Cybertruck‚Äôs 48-volt architecture.By late 2022, as Tesla prepared to start production of the Cybertruck, Awasthi was appointed head of the electric truck programme.He oversaw not only the production ramp-up but also planned future upgrades for Tesla‚Äôs high-profile pickup. This trajectory demonstrates both his technical prowess and capacity to lead complex engineering projects at a young age. During his eight-year tenure, Awasthi contributed to multiple core Tesla projects. He was integral to the Model 3 ramp-up, ensuring production efficiency and reliability. He also worked on the Shanghai Gigafactory, helping establish Tesla‚Äôs manufacturing footprint in China.His work extended to the development of new electronics and wireless architectures, critical components in Tesla‚Äôs advanced electric vehicles. Finally, Awasthi delivered the Cybertruck, Tesla‚Äôs most ambitious pickup project to date, known for its futuristic design and advanced technology. His multifaceted contributions showcase a rare blend of engineering skill, programme management, and innovation.In his social media post, Awasthi expressed deep gratitude toward Elon Musk and Tesla‚Äôs leadership. He called his colleagues ‚Äútalented, driven, and truly rockstar,‚Äù recognising the collaborative effort required to execute Tesla‚Äôs high-intensity projects. He also thanked Tesla‚Äôs customers for their support, noting that the company‚Äôs vehicles have positively impacted lives by improving safety and delivering tangible value.This acknowledgment underscores Awasthi‚Äôs perspective on teamwork and mentorship as essential to career growth, as well as his appreciation for the culture and leadership at Tesla. Despite Awasthi‚Äôs leadership, the Cybertruck has faced commercial challenges. Tesla initially aimed to produce 250,000 units annually, yet current sales reportedly remain around 25,000 per year. These figures highlight the complexity and unpredictability of launching a revolutionary vehicle.Nonetheless, Awasthi‚Äôs role in guiding the Cybertruck from concept to delivery has been significant. His work on vehicle architecture, production ramp-up, and future upgrades demonstrates a lasting legacy on Tesla‚Äôs electric truck programme. Reflecting on his time at Tesla, Awasthi described it as a ‚Äúthrilling journey,‚Äù filled with high-intensity work across multiple programmes. From the Model 3 to the Shanghai Gigafactory and finally the Cybertruck, he emphasised the personal and professional growth he experienced.
Article Summary: Awasthi‚Äôs career at tesla began as an intern immediately following his graduation in 2018. He quickly impressed the leadership with his technical expertise and drive, earning a promotion to engineering manager within two years. Awasthi was integral to the model 3 ramp-up, ensuring production efficiency and reliability.

Article Title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang to Mark Zuckerberg: I would have dropped out of college, if I had known ‚Ä¶
Article Text:
Mutual admiration and playful banter

Microsoft‚Äôs AI Bet Pays Off: Company Joins Nvidia in $4 Trillion Club

Nvidia‚Äôs journey from $200 startup to $5 trillion company

Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs dorm room to trillion-dollar empire

Nvidia Makes History: First Company to Hit $4 Trillion Market Cap





Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg took the stage for a candid and humours conversation. The tech titans shared their thoughts on the future on generative AI and the long road to building tech empires. In a lighthearted moment, Huang joked that if he had known how long it would take to succeed, the he might have followed Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs oath and dropped out of college early. ‚ÄúIf I had known it was going to take so long to succeed‚Ä¶ I would've dropped out of college just like you,‚Äù Huang quipped, drawing laughter from the audience and Zuckerberg himself.The discussion involving Huang and Zuckerberg spanned around decades of innovation. The discussion started with Zuckerberg praising Huang‚Äôs role in powering the AI revolution. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs all you‚Äîyou kind of made this happen,‚Äù Zuckerberg said, referring to Nvidia‚Äôs dominance in AI infrastructure.Responding to Zuckerberg, Jensen Huang said, ‚ÄúWhy thank you‚Ä¶ CEOs, we're delicate flowers,‚Äù poking fun at the need for appreciation even at the top.Along with this, the two tech leaders also joked about aging and appearances.‚ÄúWe‚Äôre pretty grizzled at this point,‚Äù Zuckerberg said. ‚ÄúI think we‚Äôre the two longest-standing founders in the industry.‚Äù Huang agreed, noting his gray hair while Zuckerberg commented on his curls.Huang founded Nvidia in 1993 with just the investment of $200. He launched the company on his 30th birthday which was later joined by co-founders Chris Malachowsky and Curtis Priem. Nvidia started with a mission to advance 3D graphics. The breakthrough came in 1999 with the invention of the GPU, a technology that transformed computing.Fast forward to October 2025, Nvidia has entered the $5 trillion club. The chip maker managed to reach the market valuation of $5 trillion in just three months after crossing $ 4 trillion. This growth in Nvidia's market value suggest the escalating momentum in AI adoption across industries. Shares of Nvidia rose more than 4%, pushing its market capitalisation. Nvidia ranks ahead of Microsoft ($4 trillion) and Apple ($3.9 trillion), as well as Google parent Alphabet ($3.2 trillion), Amazon ($2.4 trillion) and Meta ($1.8 trillion).Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs journey started from his dorm room in Harvard in 2004, from where he started Facebook . He famously dropped out in 2005 to focus on the company, turning down his father‚Äôs offer to invest in a McDonald‚Äôs franchise. Today, Meta is valued at $1.6 trillion.
Article Summary: Nvidia ceo jensen huang and meta ceo mark zuckerberg took the stage for a candid and humours conversation. The tech titans shared their thoughts on the future on generative ai and the long road to building tech empires. Huang joked that if he had known how long it would take to succeed, the he might have followed meta's oath and dropped out of college early.

Article Title: 5 months after Mark Zuckerberg shocked the tech industry by hiring ScaleAI's founder and many top employees; company's CFO has a message: We are ...
Article Text:
Image courtesy: LinkedIn

Scale AI CFO pushes back: ‚ÄúWe are alive and well‚Äù





Mark Zuckerberg unveils three new Meta AI smart glasses

Business is still booming





Moving ahead without Alexandr Wang





Facebook-parent Meta stunned the Silicon Valley in June this year by announcing a $14.3 billion investment in AI startup ‚Äî Scale AI. Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg made this investment to primarily onboard Scale AI founder Alexandr Wang and other top executives of the company. This move by Meta trigged an immediate speculation about the Scale AI‚Äôs viability, with major clients like OpenAI, Google, and Elon Musk‚Äôs xAI reportedly pausing work with the startup. The industry insiders also felt that the company had been effectively acquired, leaving its future uncertain. However, after almost five months after the investment made by Meta, Scale AI CFO Dennis Cinelli has pushed back this speculation. Speaking to CNBC in an interview, Cinelli said that ‚ÄòWe are a company that signed some of the best deals we have had in the history of our company, just in the last two or three months. We are not a Zombie.‚ÄùEmphasising on the fact that Scale AI has signed some of its best deals in recent months, Cinelli told CNBC, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not a zombie company,‚Äù. Along with this, he also dismissed the claims that the investment made by Meta was a licensing or acquihire deal.He emphasised that Scale AI is still an independent and completely operational.Founded in 2016, ScaleAI is known for its data-labelling services and custom AI applications for governments and enterprises. Cinelli told CNBC that both the divisions of the company are growing with revenue ‚Äúwell into the nine figures.‚Äù He also revealed that Scale AI recently secured two major contracts with the US Department of Defense which value $99 million and $100 million in August and September, respectively.Scale AI fired about 14% of its workforce in July, soon after Meta made the investment of $14.3 billion, but the company started the process of hiring and has hired 200 new employees. Along with this, the AI company is also working on expansion and is opening new offices in New York, Washington D.C., St. Louis, and London. Despite alls this, the San Francisco still remains the largest hub of the company where it is occupying 180,000 square feet of former Airbnb space.The departure of Alexandr Wang from the company was considered to a major loss. He was the world‚Äôs youngest self-made billionaire until October but Cinelli insists the ‚Äúvast majority‚Äù of employees remain. Facebook-parent Meta now owns 49% stake in ScaleAIwhich is valued around $29 billion, but the company has no voting power or product integration. ‚ÄúScale‚Äôs data business has grown every month since the Meta deal, and its applications business has doubled in the second half of 2025 compared with the first half. Scale expects the applications unit to be the primary revenue driver for the company in the future,‚Äù Cenelli told CNBC.
Article Summary: Scale ai cfo pushes back: ‚Äúwe are alive and well‚Äù facebook-parent meta made a $14.3 billion investment in ai startup scale ai. The move by meta trigged an immediate speculation about the scale ai‚Äôs viability. The industry insiders felt that the company had been effectively acquired.

Article Title: OnePlus 15 to launch in India on November 13: Features, expected price and more
Article Text:
OnePlus 15 features confirmed

OnePlus 15 expected price





OnePlus is all set to launch its latest flagship smartphone ‚Äî OnePlus 15 in India. The company has already confirmed that it will launch the smartphone on November 13 in the country. Ahead of the launch event the company has revealed the features of the upcoming high-end smartphone. The OnePlus 15 promises to deliver exceptional speed, visual clarity, and endurance, thanks to a triple-chip architecture, a 1.5K 165Hz LTPO display, and a massive 7300mAh battery‚Äîthe largest ever on a OnePlus device. Designed for gamers and heavy users alike, the device also comes with enhanced cooling, superfast charging, and improved reliability.OnePlus 15 will be equipped with an industry-first 1.5K 165Hz LTPO display, offering ultra-smooth visuals and precise color accuracy. The 6.78-inch screen supports 165fps gaming in titles like Call of Duty: Mobile and Brawl Stars, ensuring seamless gameplay. With up to 1800 nits of peak brightness and T√úV Rheinland Intelligent Eye Care 5.0 certification, the display promises clear visibility under sunlight and comfortable viewing at night.Under the hood, the phone will run on Qualcomm‚Äôs Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, paired with a dedicated touch response chip and a standalone Wi-Fi chip as part of its triple-chip system. This setup enhances multitasking, connectivity, and gaming responsiveness. OnePlus claims the device can maintain always-on 120fps gameplay with zero frame drops.The 360¬∞ Cryo-Velocity Cooling System integrates a large vapor chamber and aerospace-grade aerogel insulation to keep the phone cool during extended gaming or multitasking sessions. The result is consistent, high-end performance even under heavy load.OnePlus 15 will pack a 7,300mAh Silicon NanoStack battery, supporting 120W SUPERVOOC wired and 50W AIRVOOC wireless charging. A new Bypass Charging feature lets users power the device directly during gaming, reducing heat and preserving battery life. OnePlus says the battery retains over 80% health after four years of regular use and performs reliably even in extreme temperatures as low as -20¬∞C.The device will also boast IP66, IP68, IP69, and IP69K ratings, offering top-tier protection against dust, water, and high-pressure jets‚Äîmaking it one of the most durable OnePlus smartphones yet.On the pricing front, the OnePlus 15 is rumoured to launch in the Rs 65,000‚ÄìRs 70,000 range in India. Exact pricing will be announced by the company on November 13.
Article Summary: Oneplus 15 is set to launch in india on november 13. The company has revealed the features of the upcoming high-end smartphone. The oneplus 15 promises to deliver exceptional speed, visual clarity, and endurance. The device also comes with enhanced cooling, superfast charging, and improved reliability.

Article Title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says ‚ÄòSlack creates a lot of fake work‚Äô; Elon Musk responds: ‚ÄòAs I was saying ‚Ä¶‚Äô
Article Text:
There are positives about Slack

but I kind of dread the first hour of the morning or last time before I go to bed, where I‚Äôm just dealing with this explosion of Slack.

It creates a lot of fake work.‚Äù

‚ÄúAs I was saying, OpenAI will compete directly with Microsoft.‚Äù

"At this point, it‚Äôs insanely suicidal for Microsoft to continue supporting OpenAI".





Tesla CEO Elon Musk has reacted sharply to Sam Altman ‚Äôs remarks about office productivity tools like Slack, saying that the ChatGPT-maker OpenAI will ‚Äúcompete directly with Microsoft‚Äù. Sam Altman, founder and CEO of OpenAI recently said that while there are many positives about Slack, it also creates a ‚Äúlot of fake work‚Äù. In a now viral clip, Altman about how current workplace tools ‚Äî such as Slack, Google Docs, email, and PowerPoint ‚Äî may soon be replaced by a new generation of AI-driven systems.,‚Äù Altman said, ‚ÄúAltman added that he believes a new kind of AI-powered productivity platform is within reach ‚Äî one where ‚Äúyour AI agent and my AI agent‚Äù will handle most communication and tasks, escalating only when necessary.Elon Musk, who has long been critical of OpenAI‚Äôs close partnership with Microsoft, responded on X (formerly known as Twitter) with a pointed remark:In another post on X, Elon Musk wrote:The exchange comes as AI companies race to redefine workplace productivity. While Microsoft has heavily invested in ‚ÄúCopilot‚Äù features across its apps, Altman‚Äôs comments suggest OpenAI could be developing its own tools that may compete in the same space.In a recent post shared on X, Altman suggested that the company is planning another major new business venture, putting it in direct competition with cloud technology giants, including Google, Amazon and Microsoft.Sam Altman wrote in the post: ‚ÄúWe are also looking at ways to more directly sell compute capacity to other companies (and people); we are pretty sure the world is going to need a lot of 'AI cloud', and we are excited to offer this.‚ÄùThis means OpenAI could soon start selling cloud services, putting it in competition with established providers such as Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud. In September, OpenAI Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Sarah Friar made a similar point, suggesting that cloud providers had been ‚Äúlearning on our dime.‚Äù Her comment indicated that OpenAI was looking to safeguard its AI expertise from technology companies that may use its developments to advance their own capabilities.Notably, after the GPT-5 launch earlier in the year, Musk warned Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella about competition posed by OpenAI. ‚ÄúOpenAI is going to eat Microsoft alive,‚Äù he said.
Article Summary: Tesla ceo elon musk has reacted sharply to sam altman ‚Äôs remarks about office productivity tools like slack. Musk has long been critical of openai‚Äôs close partnership with microsoft. Altman suggested that the company is planning another major new business venture, putting it in direct competition with cloud technology giants.

Article Title: BGMI 4.1 update launches in India on November 13: Release time, new features and other things to know
Article Text:
BGMI 4.1 update release time

Google Play (Android):

30% Release: 06:30 AM IST

50% Release: 09:30 AM IST

100% Release: 11:30 AM IST

App Store (iOS):

100% Release: 09:30 AM IST

Official Website:

Full APK Release: 12:30 PM IST

BGMI 4.1 update expected features





Krafton has officially confirmed the release of Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI) 4.1 update in India. As announced by the company, the BGMI 4.1 update will be rolled out on November 13 in the country. The upcoming BGMI 4.1 update is set to introduce new content, improved gameplay features, and key system upgrades that have already created a buzz among players. Here‚Äôs what you need to know about the BGMI 4.1 update launching on November 13, 2025As revealed by Krafton India, BGMI 4.1 update will start rolling 6:30 am onwards. Here‚Äôs the full schedule below:The upcoming BGMI 4.1 update is said to deliver a winter-themed gameplay experience called Frosty Funland Mode. Players will explore icy areas like Penguinville and Penguin Towns, featuring snow-covered landscapes and settlements built by penguins. These locations will offer interactive exploration, themed loot, and weather effects that affect movement and combat.New mechanics and items aim to make battles more exciting. Leaks suggest Magic Ice Skates that let players glide and jump across frozen surfaces, and Penguin Snowmobiles, a four-seater vehicle capable of firing snowballs that slow down opponents.A new NPC Crests System will allow players to collect tokens during matches and redeem them for rewards.Frosty Funland will transform classic maps such as Erangel into a winter wonderland. Players may encounter Salted Fish Rocket Launchers that leave icy traps, Enhancement Elixirs crafted by Apothecary Penguins for temporary boosts, and other festive effects. The seasonal update is expected to include themed rewards, mythic outfits, and a new Royale Pass to complete the experience.
Article Summary: Battlegrounds mobile india (bgmi) 4.1 update will be rolled out on november 13. The upcoming bgmi 4. 1 update is said to deliver a winter-themed gameplay experience. The seasonal update is expected to include themed rewards, mythic outfits, and a new royale pass to complete the experience.

Article Title: Apple releases iOS 26.2 beta 2 for iPhone with Measure app redesign and CarPlay changes
Article Text: iOS 26.2 beta 2 introduces a Liquid Glass redesign for the Measure app's level tool and smoother system animations, aligning with WWDC demonstrations. The update also enhances the Games app with library sorting and real-time score updates, while CarPlay users gain an option to disable pinned conversations in Messages. Enhanced Safety Alerts now clarify emergency notification delivery.
Article Summary: Ios 26.2 beta 2 introduces a liquid glass redesign for the measure app's level tool. The update also enhances the games app with library sorting and real-time score updates. Carplay users gain an option to disable pinned conversations in messages. Enhanced safety alerts now clarify emergency notification delivery.

Article Title: Apple adds built-in ring light to Macs in macOS 26.2 beta
Article Text: Apple's upcoming macOS Tahoe 26.2 beta introduces 'Edge Light,' a virtual ring light for video calls. This innovative feature uses AI to adapt lighting around your Mac's display, enhancing your appearance without external gear. It intelligently adjusts to ambient conditions and offers customizable color temperatures, promising a professional look for all Apple Silicon Macs.
Article Summary: 'edge light' is a virtual ring light for video calls. It uses ai to adapt lighting around your mac's display, enhancing your appearance without external gear. It intelligently adjusts to ambient conditions and offers customizable color temperatures, promising a professional look for all apple silicon macs.

Article Title: Tata Steel's net surges over 4-fold to Rs 3,183cr in Q2
Article Text: New Delhi: Tata Steel reported an over fourfold jump in consolidated net profit to Rs 3,183 crore in the Sept quarter, mainly supported by revenues from the India operations. It had clocked a net profit of Rs 759 crore in the July-Sept period of FY25. Revenue from operations rose over 8% to Rs 59,053 crore in Q2, compared to Rs 54,503 crore in July- Sept 2024. During the quarter, Tata Steel reduced its UK debt by Rs 6,287 crore. Capital expenditure for the quarter stood at Rs 3,250 crore. tnn
Article Summary: Tata steel reported an over fourfold jump in consolidated net profit to rs 3,183 crore. It had clocked a net profit of rs 759 crore in the july-sept period of fy25. During the quarter, tata steel reduced its uk debt by rs 6,287 crore.

Article Title: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI releases GPT-5.1, fixing GPT-5's tone problem with personality presets and warmer tone
Article Text: OpenAI launches GPT-5.1 with two new variants, Instant and Thinking, aiming for warmer conversations and improved instruction following after user feedback on GPT-5. These models offer enhanced dialogue, complex problem-solving, and on-the-fly difficulty assessment, alongside eight selectable personalities and fine-tuned response controls for a more engaging user experience.
Article Summary: Openai launches gpt-5.1 with two new variants, instant and thinking. These models offer enhanced dialogue, complex problem-solving, and on-the-fly difficulty assessment. Eight selectable personalities and fine-tuned response controls for a more engaging user experience.

Article Title: Leyland's EV arm to shift plant from UK to UAE
Article Text: Switch Mobility is shutting down its UK plant and shifting production to its Ras Al Khaimah (RAK), UAE facility to cut costs and improve efficiency. "A few months ago, we decided to shut down Switch's Sherburn, UK, facility as operating there was no longer viable. We have since shifted the manufacturing of Switch buses to our RAK plant in the UAE, where we are investing under $3 million to produce buses for the UK and European markets. RAK offers better market access to Europe and the GCC, along with a more efficient cost structure," said Shenu Agarwal, MD & CEO, Ashok Leyland . "While Switch India is doing very well, after this restructuring we expect to perform much better in international markets as well, particularly in electric buses," he added.Meanwhile, Switch India has turned PAT-positive in H1FY26. K M Balaji, CFO of the company, attributed the turnaround to tighter cost control, and higher domestic volumes. Unlike many EV makers that run standalone factories, Switch leverages Leyland's manufacturing infrastructure for "gliders" - vehicle shells without batteries or powertrains . The company currently has an order book of about 1,500 electric buses.Ashok Leyland's upcoming Lucknow plant, designed primarily for e-buses , is nearing completion. Providing an update on the battery manufacturing JV with China's CALB Group Agarwal said the company is assessing potential locations and expects to finalise one within 30 to 60 days.Leyland reported its highest-ever consolidated PAT of Rs 820 crore for Q2 FY26, up from Rs 767 crore a year ago. The Board has recommended a 100% interim dividend of Re 1 per share.
Article Summary: Switch mobility is shutting down its uk plant and shifting production to its ras al khaimah (rak), uae facility. Switch india has turned pat-positive in h1fy26. Unlike many ev makers that run standalone factories, switch leverages leyland's manufacturing infrastructure for "gliders"

Article Title: 'India to be top contributor to oil demand growth'
Article Text: NEW DELHI: India is leading a group of emerging economies in reshaping global energy market dynamics, taking up the baton from China by becoming the main engine of demand growth , the International Energy Agency (IEA) said on Wednesday. According to IEA's World Energy Outlook 2025, India will be the top contributor to growth in oil demand and second largest in coal consumption by 2035. It added that by the terminal year of the outlook, over half of the country's electricity production will come from non-fossil fuel sources that'll make up 95% of capacity addition.Nearly half of the additional barrels pouring into the market by 2035 will flow towards India as its consumption rises from 5.5 million barrels a day to 8 million.
Article Summary: Iea: india will be the top contributor to growth in oil demand and second largest in coal consumption by 2035. By the terminal year of the outlook, over half of the country's electricity production will come from non-fossil fuel sources that'll make up 95% of capacity addition.

Article Title: Saudi Ministry of Interior unveils ‚ÄúWing Drone‚Äù at Hajj conference to enhance pilgrim safety and security
Article Text:
The Ministry‚Äôs Wing Drone monitors Hajj routes to Makkah and Madinah with AI-powered cameras/Representative Image



Deployment and purpose



Advanced technological features

Thermal and night-vision cameras: Capable of detecting activity in low-light or adverse weather conditions.

Artificial intelligence algorithms: Enable automated analysis of live footage to identify potential security threats or violations.

Real-time imagery transmission: Data is streamed directly to operations rooms and monitoring centers, ensuring officials can respond promptly and make informed decisions.

Public showcase at the Hajj conference



Impact on Hajj security and operations





Enhance monitoring along pilgrim routes.

Ensure compliance with Hajj regulations.

Provide rapid situational awareness to support decision-making.

Reduce the risks associated with large-scale gatherings.





The Saudi Ministry of Interior is highlighting its cutting-edge unmanned aerial vehicle, the ‚ÄúWing Drone,‚Äù at the Hajj Conference and Exhibition in Jeddah. The drone is designed to enhance the security and monitoring of pilgrims traveling to Makkah and Madinah, using advanced technology to ensure compliance with Hajj regulations and support swift decision-making in the field.During the last Hajj season, the Ministry deployed the Wing Drone along major routes leading to the holy cities of Makkah and Madinah. Its primary purpose was to monitor violations of Hajj regulations and strengthen overall security surveillance. By patrolling these critical areas, the drone supports authorities in maintaining the safety and orderliness of the pilgrimage, which sees millions of visitors each year.The Wing Drone is equipped with sophisticated technology that allows it to operate in various conditions and provide real-time intelligence:These features combine to create a highly efficient surveillance tool, enhancing situational awareness for security personnel during one of the world‚Äôs largest annual gatherings.At the Ministry‚Äôs pavilion during the Jeddah exhibition, visitors can observe and learn about the Wing Drone‚Äôs capabilities firsthand.The demonstration emphasizes how the integration of AI and advanced imaging technologies improves operational efficiency and strengthens security oversight. This public display also underlines Saudi Arabia‚Äôs commitment to leveraging innovative solutions for the safety and well-being of pilgrims.By deploying drones like the Wing Drone, the Ministry of Interior aims to:The drone represents a significant advancement in the Kingdom‚Äôs approach to crowd management and safety during Hajj, combining technology with strategic oversight to protect millions of visitors each year.
Article Summary: The ministry‚Äôs wing drone monitors hajj routes to makkah and madinah with ai-powered cameras. Data is streamed directly to operations rooms and monitoring centers, ensuring officials can respond promptly and make informed decisions. The drone represents a significant advancement in the kingdom's approach to crowd management and safety during hajj.

Article Title: 'Forced labor, withholding visa documents': H-1B visa holder from India sues US company; 'Squid Game for Indians'
Article Text:
An H-1B visa holder from India has sued his US company, led by an Indian-origin CEO, for forced labor.

Big Relief For Indians: Donald Trump Clarifies $100K H-1B Fee Won‚Äôt Apply To Existing Visa Holders





Amrutesh Vallabhaneni, an H-1B visa holder in the US, has brought a lawsuit against his employer, accusing the company of forced labor, labor trafficking and withholding visa documents, Breitbart News reported. Jay Palmer, Vallabhaneni's consultant who prepared the lawsuit, said it is a Squid Game for Indian workers in the US job market, as the ultimate goal is to stay in America, surviving the exploitative culture, created by Indian CEOs. These Indian-origin CEOs import their "home-country caste discrimination politics" to their workplaces in the US, Palmer said.According to the report, Vallabhaneni studied in India, got an F-1 student visa and a loan to attend a US college in 2015. Then he got OPT (Optional Practical Training), worked at a New Jersey company and then in 2018 moved to the company that he sued. He moved to the company as they promised him H-1B. The lawsuit said that the company violated laws and asked Vallabhaneni to pay his own salary for a period of six months. They also did not pay Vallabhaneni the prevailing wage.But after all this, Vallabhaneni was not free to leave the company as they allegedly threatened to withdraw his H-1B if he did not comply with their requests.The company also promised a green card but continued to pressure Vallabhaneni to accept their terms and conditions; otherwise he would have to leave the US."Despite being guaranteed a wage by the DOL, AV (Amrutesh Vallabhaneni) often barely had enough money for rent and living expenses for himself and his family. Because of the broken promises and inconsistent pay, his health insurance lapsed, he missed credit card payments, and he and his wife lacked access to needed healthcare. At one point, AV suffered a serious leg injury, but he couldn‚Äôt see a doctor," the lawsuit said.The company extracted a huge amount of money from AV, forcing him to pay all the visa fees and keeping him on the hook. The report said Vallabhaneni is still working with the company as he waits for the Green Card.
Article Summary: Amrutesh vallabhaneni, an h-1b visa holder in the us, has brought a lawsuit against his employer. He accused the company of forced labor, labor trafficking and withholding visa documents. The lawsuit said that the company violated laws and asked him to pay his own salary for six months.
